Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! I heard you're building a Merry-Go-Round,
so I came by to lend a hand.
<PAGE>
So what's this merry-go-round?" A ride that
takes people around in circles, y'say? Huh. This
must be one'a them foreign blueprints.
<PAGE>
Well, it beats me how you get anywhere goin' in
circles, but I get how it's put together now.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, let's get to work! I'll give you some
pointers as we go, so do like I tell you, 'kay?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, looks like it's all done. So, how do you
actually operate this thing?
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'll be headin' on home, then.

The Merry-Go-Round is complete! I should put it
somewhere.
